column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I will say this is a very good bakery with flavorful baked goods. However
column2: in my opinion it is not the best in America! The building is really nice
column3: however there in no ample parking for people and the hours are weird compared to other bakeries in Houston.  I don't like the fact the the co-owner/Chef is abandoning ship too! That's a red flag to me!!!  From previous interviews he wanted to open a bake shop in his hometown and now its the complete opposite of what he wants. Check out the article below.
